Package org.dellroad.dataskin.viewer.basic

Class BasicDisplayHooks

java.lang.Object
org.dellroad.dataskin.viewer.basic.BasicDisplayHooks
All Implemented Interfaces:
DisplayHooks
public class BasicDisplayHooks extends Object implements DisplayHooks
Basic implementation of DisplayHooks.

  • Method Details

    • buildConfigDialog

      public <C, R> void buildConfigDialog(Dialog dialog, Operation<C,R> operation, C config, Consumer<? super C> confirmed, Runnable canceled)
      Description copied from interface: DisplayHooks
      Populate the give Dialog with a form for configuring the given operation.

      This method should layout a form for editing the given configuration and arrange for one of the callbacks to be invoked when done.

      Specified by:
      buildConfigDialog in interface DisplayHooks
      Parameters:
      dialog - dialog window to populate
      operation - the operation being configured
      config - the configuration to edit
      confirmed - to invoke if configuration operation is confirmed
      canceled - to invoke if configuration operation is canceled

    • buildQueryDisplay

      public <C, R> QueryDisplay<R> buildQueryDisplay(Query<C,R> query, C config)
      Description copied from interface: DisplayHooks
      Build the component(s) that will display the results of a successful query operation.

      The component must be or contain a Grid somewhere.

      Note: no data provider should be configured; the caller of this method is responsible for that.

      Specified by:
      buildQueryDisplay in interface DisplayHooks
      Parameters:
      query - the query (to be) performed
      config - the query configuration

    • displayActionResult

      public <C, R> void displayActionResult(UI ui, Action<C,R> action, C config, R result)
      Description copied from interface: DisplayHooks
      Display a notification that the given action, which was configured via config, was successful and produced given result.

      Typically this is done via a Notification.

      Specified by:
      displayActionResult in interface DisplayHooks
      Parameters:
      ui - associated Vaadin UI
      action - the action that was performed
      result - the result from the action

    • displayOperationError

      public <C, R> void displayOperationError(UI ui, Operation<C,R> operation, C config, Throwable error)
      Description copied from interface: DisplayHooks
      Display a notification that the given operation, which was configured via config, failed with the given exception.

      Typically this is done via a Notification.

      If the exception is an InterruptedException, then the operation was cancelled.

      Specified by:
      displayOperationError in interface DisplayHooks
      Parameters:
      ui - associated Vaadin UI
      operation - the operation that failed
      config - the operation's configuration
      error - the exception caught

    • getFieldBuilder

      protected <T> FieldBuilder<T> getFieldBuilder(com.google.common.reflect.TypeToken<T> type)
      Get a FieldBuilder for the given type.

      This method caches its results to speed up repeated invocations, only invoking newFieldBuilder(java.lang.Class<T>) the first time type is seen.

    • getGridColumnScanner

      protected <T> GridColumnScanner<T> getGridColumnScanner(com.google.common.reflect.TypeToken<T> type)
      Get a GridColumnScanner for the given type.

      This method caches its results to speed up repeated invocations, only invoking newGridColumnScanner(java.lang.Class<T>) the first time type is seen.

    • newFieldBuilder

      protected <T> FieldBuilder<T> newFieldBuilder(Class<T> type)
      Create a new FieldBuilder for the given type.

      The implementation in BasicDisplayHooks creates a FieldBuilder that uses BasicDisplayHooks.FieldBuilderContext for context.

    • newGridColumnScanner

      protected <T> GridColumnScanner<T> newGridColumnScanner(Class<T> type)
      Create a new GridColumnScanner for the given type.

      The implementation in BasicDisplayHooks just invokes the GridColumnScanner constructor. Subclasses can override to customize the GridColumnScanner used.
